NomaiObject:
Clue to convey: Warp transmitters require a warp receiver (context: wait, the warp receiver isnt installed yet!)
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
POKE: Clary, are you alright? Oh, thank goodness you were caught before you fell into the black hole..
2
1
CLARY: I am fine, Poke. But why did you so urgently call for me? I was so eager to finally jump into the black hole we have lived above for so long!
3
1
POKE: Clary, the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color> is not yet operational! Had you jumped into the black hole, you would have been stranded!
4
3
POKE: A warp transmitter requires a connected warp receiver to function; the <color=orange>White Hole Station's</color> warp transmitter does not yet have a connected warp receiver for it to transport Nomai to at this time!
5
4
CLARY: What? Poke, I do not understand why you would leave this step for last! Has a site for the <color=orange>White Hole Station's</color> warp receiver been chosen yet?
6
5
POKE: There should be ample space on the surface above the <color=orange>Hanging City.</color> Building the warp receiver there should also provide convenient travel back to the city from the <color=orange>White Hole Station.</color>
7
6
CLARY: That sounds wise. In that case, I'm off to install the warp receiver on the surface!
8
7
CLARY: Afterwards: nothing shall stand between me and the black hole!
BH_H EX1 1
BH_H EX2 6
BH_H EX3 4
